compatibility.notes: LGPL-2.0-only allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but static linking may impose stricter requirements than dynamic linking.

key_requirements: Ensure that recipients have the same rights as you.
Make sure to provide the source code or a means to obtain it.
Include the license text and copyright notice in all copies or substantial portions of the library.
license.name: LGPL-2.0-only
obligations: Distribute copies of the library with the same rights granted to you.
Provide access to the source code when distributing the library.
Provide complete object files for relinking if the library is linked with a program.
Include a copy of the LGPL license with any distribution.
State any changes made to the library when distributing modified versions.
